name: INKIDOKI AND PHOENIX
description:
Join the journey of INKIDOKI card collector PHOENIX (Paul Warren)!
​
In this game, the player uses the direction keys to move in a virtual space and uses the skill buttons to remove all blocks on the floor.
​
To achieve the goal, the player must avoid numerous obstacles and use great skills at the right time.
​
You can avoid or attack obstacles with skills such as invisibility, area-of-effect attacks (AOE), and giantization.
​
Enjoy beautiful pictures, bright and exciting levels, and fun music!
